category.name: Data Sharing.Multi-Site Collaboration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: IDSM_global_dsa_set_local_volume_on_import
preference.preference_description: Sets the local default volume for a user based on the name of the users default group name only for the initial import. Sets the local default volume for a group based on the group name only for the initial import. Valid Values: Enter values as Group-name:Volume-name, one entry per line, for example: Engineering:DrawingVol
